title: Video: Return to Balance Meditation - California College of Ayurveda
author: CCA Staff
description: In this video, Dr. Marc Halpern shares a simple meditation to return to balance, guiding the viewers to relax, access clarity, and come back to the natural sense of ease and well-being.
cleaned_text: In this video, Dr. Marc Halpern shares a simple meditation to return to balance, guiding the viewers to relax, access clarity, and come back to the natural sense of ease and well-being.
